Text: It's an adaption of an Australian book so not sure how it is a copy. Thanks for the upload

Yeah, that's like saying "The Town" is just a copy of the Deniro/Pacino movie "Heat".

It would be more appropriate to say "If you like this movie, you'll probably like Red Dawn, also."
That sucks that 2 and 3 don't come out until 2012 and 2013.  This is a good story.
Red Dawn is a pathetic movie. C. Thomas Howell going all Rambo. Do yourselves a favour and watch this one instead.
